column2: This decision will send an event for each vassal to choose which to release if not all of them.
Just put the fries in the bag, puppet
Can we go now? (read the tooltip to see which nation this is)
Bring the Persians into the fold officially, big wins!!
Secure our position at the doorstep of India, maybe we could learn a thing or two from the Mughals. . .
Our expeditions into Central Asia have drawn us closer to the people currently persecuted by the Qing, perhaps we could convince them in a new mandate.
We will strike into Prussia Proper so we may secure our control over Poland!
We will strike into Galicia so we may secure our hold over Ukraine!
We will strike into Norway so we may easily bypass the Danish Belts!
SO MUCH WIN!! Lets keep it up
SO MUCH WIN!! Lets keep it up
SO MUCH WIN!! Lets keep it up
In order to host the biggest, best party on the Pacific, we need the ports to bring in the tourists and drinks!!!
We can't forget about our brothers across the Strait! Maybe we can hook them up properly for once and get that colony on its feet! First, a little R&R. .
A Pacific Fleet will require many guns and shipbuilders to keep the party going. Vladivostok offers the perfect location to ship-in resources to develop these industries.
When the Americans and British discussed their borders on the Pacific, there was someone they forgot to ask. We will correct this error!

Our officers have come to us with the breakthrough that they should just put the recently developed super-howitzers onto our boats in order to claim dominance over the Pacific. They would certainly move quicker on water atleast.
All the European and even some Asian nations have been dreaming of claiming the islands of the Pacific. We should get their bright and early since we cant seem to be friends.

We finally made it, all the pieces are together for the world's greatest rager. From Vladivostok and Port Arthur to Oregon and California, the world will be reminded that no one can do it like Russia!.

Get your motor running, California Interstate 1, Pacific Coast Party, If you got to work today, Get yourself a new vocation, Pacific Coast Party, You don't have to mind father time, mother nature, Get yourself in line, take your time, And watch it slip away, Just quit your bitching, bite your tongue, Save it for a rainy day, son, Pacific Coast Party, Get your ticket pack your bags, Come and join the celebration, Pacific Coast Party, If you wanna find peace of mind come and get it, Get yourself in line take your time, And watch it slip away, Pacific Coast Party, Hey, I heard somebody say, Work harder than you play, But I never missed a single day's party, Word, I never heard a word, I turned the other way, Pacific Coast Party.
Schlawgga think he going free! is this true?
Have each vassal send us an event to release or not
Reduce Factory Inputs and Increase Factory Outputs
Promote Craftsmen and Reduce Factory Inputs as well as Increase Factory Outputs
Promote Clerks and Reduce Factory Inputs as well as Increase Factory Outputs
Promote Soldiers and Reduce Factory Inputs as well as Increase Factory Outputs
Reduce Factory Inputs, Increase Factory Outputs, and Increase Mining/Farming Efficiency
Promote Soldiers and Boost Assimilation Rate
Promote Craftsmen and Boost Assimilation Rate
Promote Bureaucrats and Increase Internal Migrant Priority
With the discovery of Phenomenalism, you have begun to explore new methods of controlling your nations thinking.
With the discovery of Experimental Psychology, you have begun to explore new methods of controlling your nations thinking.
With the discovery of Psychoanalysis, you have begun to explore new methods of controlling your nations thinking.
Boosts II Unlock from Experimental Psychology
The Brotherhood has entrusted me. It is time for a harvest. Fields of green. . ..
Peace Through Power will be the slogan to unite Earth!
Serbia has treated us well, but it is time we expand our operation and begin mining Tiberium in earnest. . .
They got away somehow. . . §RThis will instantly declare war on India!§b(release the other one by decision if you only lost one puppet).
You need to pay your admin for this to do anything
Our preparations around the source of the heavenly Mandate are complete. With one order, we can begin marching into Manchuria to setup our first of many outposts.
Its the Green its the green its the green you need!!! Who needs Samarkand when you have India Super Power 1920!
We are building the mother of all call centers, Jack! You're gonna have to crack a few whips. . .
ITS COMING HOME! SHES COMIN HOME TO SAMARKAND!

Switch it up!
§BArmy School - §G10% Army and 5% Industry
§BNavy School - §G10% Navy and 5% Industry
§BIndustry School - §G10% Industry and 5% Commerce 
§BCulture School - §G10% Culture and 5% Industry 
§BCommerce School - §G10% Commerce and 5% Army§b
Militia have been raised here already
I just scienced all over the place. . .

This instantly builds naval bases up to their level researched. IMPORTANT! It cannot place them down for you at level 1. It also won't bankrupt you, it will only take whats available. Naval bases that are already built up will still count towards the cost so its all or nothing SORRY!! The prices increase as usual although not according to material costs.
Use this to take control of puppet units
Removes Hungarian Mobs until KuK is formed
Mexico is old news, what we have will shine brighter than anything in North America!
cooldown so event doesnt spam you
This event makes it so you are at war with everyone's puppets regardless of truces.\n§BO.K. Garmin!\n§RCall in my vassals!§b
Hide yo kids. Hide yo wife. And hide yo husband. Cause they be rapin er'body up here!
Burn and Plunder, until nothing remains.
Stop trying to ally the Space Marines in the mountains, they are neutral.
Its time to prove who runs this peninsula
We arent gonna give them anything we just gonna let them vote dont worry
The King/Queen is not in Town
Pedro de Alcântara João Carlos Leopoldo Salvador Bibiano Francisco Xavier de Paula Leocádio Miguel Gabriel Rafael Gonzaga
During the early 19th Century, Brazil experienced a period of extreme unrest before Dom Pedro II was of age.

Despite earlier efforts and legislation, the slave trade still exists due to a lack of enforcement. Eventhough Great Britain threatens us with punitive action over it, economic incentives are a difficult force to overcome. . .
Institutional reform has failed many, so those who wish to see change act on their own to bring about a new future. There are slave owners who free their slaves in their wills.

The regency is plaguing the country with instability and corruption, but we need kid Pedro to be an adult to be declared King. We could just say he is old enough I guess. . .\n§G This will lock you out of the oligarch path and lead you down a path of internal reform and freeing the slaves!§b

Pedro II was an avid enthusiast of education, claiming that teaching was the most noble profession. He is responsible for Brazil's oldest universities and research campuses, promoting the democratization of the academic world.

The monarchy is an old institution that needs to be fully removed in order to protect the interests of the nation. Currently, it prevents us from effectively leading the nation as the heir is not of age yet.\n§R This will lock you out of Pedro II's decisions and lead you down a path of expansion and enslavement.§b
Form the Empire of Brazil, Portugal, and the Algarves
Empire of Brazil, Portugal, and the Algarves
Although previous efforts have reduced slavery greatly, it is still technically present within our great nation. With the Lei Áurea, we will end this institution nationwide!
Yeah we are straight evil. Time to start enslaving natives n such for profit.\n(This will stop the random events and give a decision instead)
Minas Gerais has a wealth of gems, minerals, and metals. With our newly acquired labor force, we could exploit this resource. . . .
Exactly what the title says. Of course if no one is selling, we cant buy.
Due to our failure to crush our enemies in the Cisplatine War, we ended up being forced to grant Uruguay independence. It's time that we strike them back and bring Cisplatina into our fold again!
Theres a wealth of minerals and metals that pickaxes and wheelbarrows cannot excavate. We should purchase modern equipment from Europe to transform the state into the world's source of coal and iron.
Now that the Great Egyptian Civil War has started, we must act quickly to reunite the region under Mr. 1's rule. We may hope to find ancient treasures along the way...
An ancient artefact buried deep within Alexandria holds the secrets to our success. We must retreive this artefact!
The Pharoah shall rule Egypt once more!
End your current campaign to start another
The promise of a Jewish homeland, despite regional conflicts, has drawn them away from our nation and towards the Middle East.
Charles has been around South America researching the next big thing, im sure he would stop by to entertain the Emperor for a bit on the subject.

In a collaboration between Paul Landowski, Heitor da Silva Costa, Gheorghe Leonida, and Albert Caquot, a statue of Jesus Christ was created overlooking Rio de Janeiro. It stands 30m high on a 700m peak with its arms stretched out towards the world.
§bThis is it, what everything has culminated towards, the enslavement of THE WORLD itself. . .
There are records in Alexandria of an Ancient Weapon buried deep under Malta, we must find it!
There are records in Alexandria of an Ancient Weapon buried deep under Baghdad, we must find it!
There are records in Alexandria of an Ancient Weapon buried deep under Khartoum, we must find it!

From 1580 to 1640 existed a dynastic union of the Kingdom of Spain and the Kingdom of Portugal under the Spanish Crown, also known as the Union Iberica. It was the most powerful and respected country in the world and streched from China to Mexico, it was the first empire, where the sun never set. To reignite the glory of the old empire, we shall unite again!
We must unite the Islamic World under our banner, like the prophet wanted it. Allahu Akbar!

§RThis will antagonize Russia.§b The Treaty of Kucuk Kaynarca authorised the Russian ambassador in Istanbul to defend the autonomy of Moldavia and Wallachia in 1774. After the Russo-Turkish War of 1828/1829, the Treaty of Adrianople strengthened the autonomy of the Danubian Principalities even further. We will not make the same mistake twice, we will unite the empire fully under the leadership of the Sublime Porte!
For too long the national ambition of the Italian people have been ignored. If we cannot unite all Italians by force, we must unite all that we can.
We have united the south and have incorporated their cultures into our own.
We have united the north and have incorporated their cultures into our own.
We have united all of South America and are ready to take our rightful place among the other Great Powers.
Central America is weak and without a leader. We must take charge and restore order.
Once we have total control of the Egyptian lands, we can bring them back to the loving and embracing arms of Allah.

The United Netherlands was created in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars through the fusion of territories that had belonged to the former Dutch Republic and Austrian Netherlands in order to form a buffer state between the major European powers. The polity collapsed in 1830 with the outbreak of the Belgian Revolution. With the de facto secession of Belgium, the Netherlands was left as a rump state and refused to recognise Belgian independence. Now it is time to reunite our people into the United Kingdom of the Netherlands!

After the defeat of Napoleon in 1815, the Duchy of Luxemburg was restored. At the Congress of Vienna the great powers decided that Luxemburg would become a member state of the newly formed German Confederation, but at the same time William I of the Netherlands, the King of the Netherlands, would become, in personal union, the head of state. Now we shall make it a integral part of the Netherlands.
Switch to Dutch Merchant Fleet Tech School
Our long naval and commercial tradition will give us an edge in these fields
